summary: Moomin, Sniff and My set out to stop a comet approaching the Moomin valley. Along the way they meet Snusmumriken, the beautiful Snorkfröken, Snorken and a Hemul, who join them in their quest.
cast: Rabbe Smedlund|Jyrki Kovaleff|Elina Salo|Ulla Tapaninen|Matti Ruohola|Pertti Koivula|Misa Palander|Ilkka Merivaara|Tapio Hämäläinen|Leena Uotila|Markku Huhtamo|Michel Budsko|Riko Eklundh|Chris af Enehielm|Ragni Grönblom|Sam Huber|Dick Idman|Mika Kanai|Takehito Koyasu|Margit Lindeman|Sixten Lundberg|Ryûsei Nakao|Michael C. Pizzuto|Rei Sakuma|Johan Simberg|Vivi-Ann Sjögren|Peik Stenberg|Lilli Sukula-Lindblom|Minami Takayama|Ikuko Tani|Akio Ôtsuka
title: Comet in Moominland
